data.title: North Cobb Christian
data.meta_description: View our calendar of upcoming events at North Cobb Christian, a private K-12 school in Kennesaw, GA.
data.text:
Our children aren’t just taught — they’re loved. NCCS teachers pour themselves into the students, molding who they become.

NCCS Parent

Together ... Cultivating Hearts. Challenging Minds. Impacting Culture.

As a coeducational private Christian day school, North Cobb Christian School is home to over 1,200 students in preschool K3 through 12th grade. Committed to Jesus Christ, North Cobb Christian School provides a biblically based, academically excellent education in a nurturing environment, developing students’ potential to impact their world for Christ.
